mapper.select: select count(1) from T_GET_PACKAGE_TIME t where t.config_code=#{configCode} and t.del_flag=0
mapper.update: update T_GET_PACKAGE_TIME t set t.del_flag=1,t.modify_time=sysdate where ID = #{configId}
update T_GET_PACKAGE_TIME t set t.del_flag=1,t.modify_time=sysdate where ID in #{id}
update T_GET_PACKAGE_TIME t set t.bl_flag=#{blFlag},t.modify_time=sysdate, t.modify_user_code=#{modifyUserCode} where ID in #{id}
